alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Holmes; Jackson; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued November 30 at 8:54AM EST until November 30 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 577 REMAINS VALID UNTIL NOON EST TODAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA BAY CALHOUN HOLMES JACKSON WALTON WASHINGTON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA MILLER SEMINOLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABE SPRINGS, ALPINE HEIGHTS, ARGYLE, BABCOCK, BARKER STORE, BELLVIEW, BENNETT, BLOUNTSTOWN, BONIFAY, BOYKIN, BROWNTOWN, CAIRO, CALLAWAY, CENTER RIDGE, CHIPLEY, CHIPLEY MUNICIPAL AIRPORT, CLARKSVILLE, CLUSTER SPRINGS, COBB CROSSROADS, COLQUITT, COOKTOWN, CRYSTAL LAKE, DAVIS PARK, DE FUNIAK SPRING AIRPORT, DE FUNIAK SPRINGS, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DURHAM, ECONFINA, ENTERPRISE, EUCHEEANNA, FAIRCHILD, FIVE POINTS, FRINK, GRACEVILLE, HOLMES COUNTY AIRPORT, LEONIA, LITTLE HOPE, LYNN HAVEN, MALONE, MARIANNA, MARYSVILLE, MAYHAW, NEW HOPE, NIXON, ORANGE HILL, PANAMA CITY, POPLAR HEAD, RICHTER CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SCOTTS FERRY, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SIMSVILLE, AND SNEADS.
